g.text: Choose a plan that works for you
Payment issues? We auto-retry on days 1, 3, 7
with a 7-day grace period before cancellation.
As a user, I can choose between
Current plan status, next billing date,
and payment method on file displayed.
User can also manually cancel anytime.

svg.text: subscription tiers | recurring billing | auto-retry | grace period | payment webhook verification
